alert.note: Alert for Marathon; Portage; Wood (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 12:08AM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Wood, northwestern Portage and Marathon Counties through 100 AM CDT... At 1207 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles northwest of Rib Mountain to near Neillsville. Movement was east at 70 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Wausau and Rib Mountain around 1215 AM CDT. Weston around 1220 AM CDT. Marshfield around 1225 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include North Wood County Park, Big Eau Pleine County Park, Moon, Blenker, Fenwood, Powers Bluff County Park, Hogarty, Bethel, Knowlton and Vesper. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
